meta.name: Vanilla HTML/JS/CSS (No Build)
meta.description: Self-contained HTML components with inline JS/CSS, CDN resources, postMessage IPC, and localStorage state. Zero-build, browser-native.

architecture.summary: Zero-build architecture. HTML components are self-contained with inline CSS/JS. Components embed in parent via <object> tags. Communication via postMessage, state in localStorage.

layers.name: Orchestrator (ORK)
layers.description: Parent HTML page managing composition, view switching, and cross-component messaging. Single source of truth in localStorage.

layers.name: Components (CMP)
layers.description: Self-contained HTML files with inline styles and scripts. Copy-paste reusable, embed via <object> tag.

layers.name: Utilities (MOD)
layers.description: Reusable JavaScript classes embedded as <script> tags. Pure functions, no DOM manipulation.

layers.name: State (localStorage)
layers.description: Persistent state via localStorage with window.appState getter/setter. Components watch via storage events.

architecture.dataFlow: ORK embeds CMP via <object> -> CMP postMessage to ORK -> ORK updates localStorage -> CMP watches storage events

ORK.snippet:
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<!-- @archeon:section head -->
<head>
  <meta charset="utf-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,initial-scale=1">
  <title>{PAGE_TITLE}</title>
  <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.5.1/css/all.min.css">
  <style>
    {GLOBAL_STYLES}
  </style>
</head>
<!-- @archeon:endsection -->

<!-- @archeon:section body -->
<body class="min-h-screen flex flex-col">
  <!-- Components embedded via object tag -->
  {COMPONENT_EMBEDS}
</body>
<!-- @archeon:endsection -->

<!-- @archeon:section message-handlers -->
<script>
  window.addEventListener('message', (event) => {
    {MESSAGE_HANDLERS}
  });
</script>
<!-- @archeon:endsection -->

<!-- @archeon:section state-management -->
<script>
  // Cross-component state via localStorage
  class AppState {
    constructor(storageKey = 'app-state') {
      this.storageKey = storageKey;
    }
    get(key, defaultValue = null) {
      const data = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(this.storageKey) || '{}');
      return data[key] !== undefined ? data[key] : defaultValue;
    }
    set(key, value) {
      const data = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(this.storageKey) || '{}');
      data[key] = value;
      localStorage.setItem(this.storageKey, JSON.stringify(data));
    }
  }
  window.appState = new AppState();
  
  {STATE_INITIALIZATION}
</script>
<!-- @archeon:endsection -->
</html>

MOD.description: Utility/helper JavaScript module for shared logic (embedded in CMP or ORK as inline script)

embedding: CMP can only be embedded in ORK via <object data="components/xxx.html" type="text/html">
CMP cannot import other CMP directly; use postMessage for communication
ORK orchestrates all view switching and component composition
communication: Child-to-parent: postMessage to window.parent, parent listens with window.addEventListener('message', ...)
state: Transient state via window globals (caution: cross-component coupling)
Component-local state via DOM or inline script variables
resources: Use CDN for Font Awesome or icon library
All fonts and assets relative paths (../assets/fonts/...)
